description: AI-powered writing assistant for content creation, code generation, translations, and more using multiple AI models.

actions.name: create_code
actions.description: Generate code in a specified programming language based on instructions.

actions.name: create_email
actions.description: Compose an email using context, recipient ("To"), and sender ("From") metadata.

actions.name: create_paraphrase
actions.description: Rewrite text while preserving its meaning.

actions.name: create_product_description
actions.description: Create a product description using details like name, brand, category, features, keywords.

actions.name: create_social_media_caption
actions.description: Generate a caption tailored for a specific social media channel (requires channel and keywords).

actions.name: create_summary
actions.description: Summarize input text to concise form.

actions.name: create_translation
actions.description: Translate input text into a target language.

actions.name: send_prompt
actions.description: Send a custom prompt to TextCortex AI and generate a completion.
